feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas in a similar style to separate clauses and provide additional information.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical and grammatical complexity, with no significant variations in word choice or grammatical structures.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are relatively similar in terms of length and complexity, maintaining coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a similar narrative style and tone, discussing serious topics in a matter-of-fact manner.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either text, indicating a similar level of attention to detail.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
